text: salamdeul-iyeo hananim-i neohuileulchangjohasa namseong-gwa yeoseong-eul dugo jong joggwa bujog-eul dueoss-eudoe seologa seo loleul aldolog hayeossnola hananim ap eseo gajang keuge yeong-gwang-eul bad-eul janeun gajang uiloun jalo hananim-eun modeun geos-eul asimyeo gwanchalhasineun bun-isila
